trans-unit.source: Scenario 3 - Restore of a Damaged Mirror

seg-source.mrk: Scenario 3 - Restore of a Damaged Mirror

target.mrk: Scénario 3 - Restauration d’un miroir endommagé

trans-unit.source: This diagram (<MadCap:xref href="#hss_scenario3" class="figure_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Figure</MadCap:xref>) illustrates <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductNameHSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> when restoring a damaged mirror.

seg-source.mrk: This diagram (<MadCap:xref href="#hss_scenario3" class="figure_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Figure</MadCap:xref>) illustrates <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductNameHSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> when restoring a damaged mirror.

target.mrk: Le schéma (<MadCap:xref href="#hss_scenario3" class="figure_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Figure</MadCap:xref>) illustre le <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductNameHSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> lors de la restauration d'un miroir endommagé.

seg-source.mrk: Scenario 3

target.mrk: Scénario 3

seg-source.mrk: Prerequisites

target.mrk: Conditions préalables

trans-unit.source: Both <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> s must have the same hardware, same operating system and same HyperStream installation path

seg-source.mrk: Both <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> s must have the same hardware, same operating system and same HyperStream installation path

target.mrk: Les deux serveurs <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> doivent avoir le même matériel, le même système d'exploitation et le même chemin d'installation HyperStream

alt-trans.seg-source: Both <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />s must have the same hardware, same operating system and same HyperStream installation path
alt-trans.target: Les deux <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />s doivent avoir le même matériel, le même système d'exploitation et le même chemin d'installation HyperStream

trans-unit.source: Do not run any <MadCap:variable name="HSS.tn" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> backups during the restore

seg-source.mrk: Do not run any <MadCap:variable name="HSS.tn" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> backups during the restore

target.mrk: Ne pas lancer de sauvegardes <MadCap:variable name="HSS.tn" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> pendant la restauration.

seg-source.mrk: Hypothesis

target.mrk: Hypothèses

trans-unit.source: Mirrored configuration HyperStream_A to and from HyperStream_B

seg-source.mrk: Mirrored configuration HyperStream_A to and from HyperStream_B

target.mrk: Copie miroir configurée dans les deux sens entre HyperStream_A et HyperStream_B

seg-source.mrk: HyperStream_B is lost

target.mrk: HyperStream_B a été perdu.

seg-source.mrk: Procedure

target.mrk: Procédure

seg-source.mrk: Stop HyperStream_A.

target.mrk: Arrêtez HyperStream_A.

trans-unit.source: If available, from HyperStream_B, secure a copy of the conf/config.xml file.

seg-source.mrk: If available, from HyperStream_B, secure a copy of the conf/config.xml file.

target.mrk: Si disponible, à partir d'HyperStream_B, sécurisez une copie du fichier conf/config.xml.

trans-unit.source: Overwrite HyperStream_B with a full copy of HyperStream_A (installation path + all repositories + all streams).

seg-source.mrk: Overwrite HyperStream_B with a full copy of HyperStream_A (installation path + all repositories + all streams).

target.mrk: Écrasez HyperStream_B avec une copie complète de HyperStream_A (chemin d’installation + tous les répertoires de stockage + tous les flux).

trans-unit.source: Replace the file config.xml in the Conf directory of HyperStream_B with the one copied in step 2. If the file is not available, you will find a copy of config.xml in the first repository.

seg-source.mrk: Replace the file config.xml in the Conf directory of HyperStream_B with the one copied in step 2.
If the file is not available, you will find a copy of config.xml in the first repository.

target.mrk: Remplacez le fichier config.xml dans le répertoire Conf de HyperStream_B avec celui que vous avez copié à l’step 2.
Si le fichier n'est pas disponible, vous trouverez une copie de config.xml dans le premier répertoire de stockage.

seg-source.mrk: Start HyperStream_B.

target.mrk: Démarrez HyperStream_B.

seg-source.mrk: Start HyperStream_A.

target.mrk: Démarrez HyperStream_A.

seg-source.mrk: Verification

target.mrk: Vérification

trans-unit.source: Use the resync_hss command to display the number of streams to send or get. If the mirrors are synchronized, there should be no stream to send or get.

seg-source.mrk: Use the resync_hss command to display the number of streams to send or get.
If the mirrors are synchronized, there should be no stream to send or get.

target.mrk: Utilisez la commande resync_hss pour afficher le nombre de flux à envoyer ou récupérer.
Si les miroirs sont synchronisés, il ne devrait y avoir aucun flux envoyer ni à récupérer.
